hero.name: Praneeth Reddy
hero.description: Full-Stack Developer passionate about creating scalable, enterprise-level applications. Specialized in modern web technologies with a focus on performance optimization and clean architecture.

about: I am a dedicated software engineer with 5+ years of experience building robust web applications. My expertise spans across frontend frameworks (React, Vue), backend systems (Node.js, Python), and cloud platforms. I'm passionate about writing clean, maintainable code and mentoring junior developers.

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: Built a full-stack e-commerce platform with React frontend, Node.js backend, and PostgreSQL database. Features include user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, and payment integration.

projects.title: Real-Time Chat Application
projects.description: Developed a real-time messaging app using Socket.io, React, and Node.js. Includes group chats, file sharing, and user presence indicators.

projects.title: AI Content Generator
projects.description: Created an AI-powered content generator integrating OpenAI API. Built with React and Flask backend, allowing users to generate creative content.

projects.title: Task Management Dashboard
projects.description: Developed a collaborative task management tool with real-time updates, team workspaces, and analytics dashboard using React and Firebase.

certifications.title: AWS Certified Solutions Architect
certifications.description: Professional level certification demonstrating expertise in designing scalable AWS solutions.

certifications.title: The Complete JavaScript Course
certifications.description: Comprehensive JavaScript course covering ES6+, DOM manipulation, and modern JavaScript practices.

certifications.title: React: The Complete Guide
certifications.description: Expert-level React course covering hooks, context, performance optimization, and best practices.

certifications.title: Full Stack Web Development
certifications.description: Comprehensive full-stack development specialization covering front-end and back-end technologies.
